forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
